Price: Indian Residents: INR 56,640 (48,000 + 18% GST); International Students: $1,440; SAARC Students: $720
Price/Week: Indian Residents: INR 4,720; International Students: $120; SAARC Students: $60
Projects: Multiple hands-on labs, coding assignments, and end-to-end case studies/projects
Additional Services: Access to all course materials and recordings, Professional certificate from IIIT Hyderabad, Access to course community and forums, 5 academic credits (accrue to ABC if ID provided)
Eligibility Criteria: Age 18+ years old; Basic programming knowledge (preferably Python, including iteration, function calls) is compulsory; Comfortable with basic mathematics (functions and their plots); Able to dedicate 12 hours per week for the 12-week duration; Familiarity with basic machine learning concepts (classification, regression, neural networks) is a plus but not required.
